attributes.action: Vote of no confidence in Michael Gove
attributes.additional_details: As teachers, educators, parents and students, we believe that the Education Secretary is wilfully ignoring what is best for the children of the UK; in favour of his own elitist agenda and the systematic deconstruction of our education system. He must be held accountable for his ignorant and self-serving actions and policies. He is out of touch, confrontational and is not serving the best interests of the electorate, or the vast majority of the professionals he supposedly leads.
